name: Collabdraw
body:
SERVER REQUIREMENTS:
-------------
1. Python 3.2+
2. All python packages specified in requirements.txt (which might involve installing other
non-python dependencies like cairo, redis)
3. Redis server
4. libpoppler, imagemagick for upload functionality
5. ffmpeg to enable video functionality

INSTALLATION:
-------------
1. Clone the git repository 
``` 
git clone git://github.com/anandtrex/collabdraw.git
```
1. Initialize submodules
``` 
git submodule init &&
git submodule update
```
1. Set the hostnames, ports and other options in config.py
    
RUNNING:
-------------
1. Run the redis server
2. Run "python main.py"

KNOWN-ISSUES:
-------------
1. Doesn't work very well on android gingerbread browsers due to limited html5 support
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
